Literature.Title: Conversion of Broad-Spectrum Antimicrobial Peptides into Species-Specific Antimicrobials Capable of Precisely Targeting Pathogenic Bacteria.
Literature.Author: Xu L, Shao C, Li G, Shan A, Chou S, Wang J, Ma Q, Dong N

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=16µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=32µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium C77-31(MIC=8µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Pullorum C79-13(MIC=4µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=2µM)
